title: Clients in Peru Support "Operation Smile" by Using Citibank Products
summary: Lima, Peru – Citibank introduced the "Winning is as easy as giving a smile" campaign. This promotion is valid from April 29, 2011, until June 30, 2011, featuring multiple benefits and rewards for using a Citibank credit or debit card, getting a personal loan, or opening a new savings or CTS account.
tag-1: Clients in Peru Support "Operation Smile" by Using Citibank Products
tag-3: Lima, Peru – Citibank introduced the "Winning is as easy as giving a smile" campaign. This promotion is valid from April 29, 2011, until June 30, 2011, featuring multiple benefits and rewards for using a Citibank credit or debit card, getting a personal loan, or opening a new savings or CTS account.
tag-4: "Initiatives like this one show our commitment to responsible finance, and to the communities where we live and work," said Jose Antonio Blanco, CCO of Citibank del Peru.
tag-5: Clients who use Citibank products during the campaign will be giving financial support to Operation Smile, a not-for-profit organization dedicated to providing free plastic-surgery recovery to low-income children who suffer from harelip and/or cleft palate.
tag-6: Additionally, Citibank offers exclusive benefits to its clients, such as travel miles, monthly-fee waivers, or attractive interest-rates in savings account and CTS.
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Through Citicorp and Citi Holdings, Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management. Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com.
tag-9: Operation Smile Operation Smile is a not-for-profit organization incorporated by the Ministry of Health, dedicated to plastic-surgery recovery of children and youth who suffer from harelip and/or cleft palate. Operation Smile was founded in 1999 under Citibank CCO´s direction 11 years ago, and is supported by many companies now. It has benefited more than 2,500 people.
